description:
If your kids or yourself would like to learn the basics of the English language in a fun and engaging manner, this is the course for you or your children. The four characters, Lenny, Paco, Alex and Maya will teach you through fun-filled animations picturing everyday situations.

This course includes twenty-six short animation videos that explore different themes, from shapes and colours to means of transportation, things found around the house, different moods or days, months and seasons. The videos are divided in six categories: The basics, Useful words, Express yourself, At home, The outside world and Nature.

There are approximately 50 minutes of animation to watch. Students should therefore be able to complete the course in approximately 1 to 3 hours.

This introduction course was designed by ESL teachers with decades of experience in and outside the classroom teaching and tutoring kids at the elementary and high school levels. These materials have been used successfully with children of different ages.

So what are you waiting for!? Come and join Lenny, Paco, Maya and Alex in their adventures!
title: Introduction to English for kids and beginners
